crypto.name: benaloh
crypto.desc: No, it can't be. Who chose the nonces? I demand to know! I can't remember the last time... I saw an LCG.

crypto.name: garbled
crypto.desc: My friend gave me a weird circuit to evaluate, but I forgot to ask her for the input. I know the circuit is supposed to return true, but everything's been garbled and I can't make heads or tails of it.

crypto.name: plagiarism
crypto.desc:
>>> Can I copy your CTF challenge?

>> Yeah, just change it up a bit so it doesn't look obvious you copied.

crypto.name: signature-sheep-scheming-signature-schemes
crypto.desc: The National Sheep Agency is pushing to standardize their own post-quantum digital signature. Something's not right...

pwn.name: AdultCSP
pwn.desc: I've decided to a bit of dev work on my chrome instance. I'm not sure if it's very secure though, can you give it a look? Some relevant files: `~/chromium/src (ctf) $ git log -10 > log.txt` `~/chromium/src (ctf) $ git diff 36207b9a431a90704bec616b9f6b972ec85db777 72ef15b02c86efcf5c4a0c7b1134bcbb928143f6 > diff.txt` ``` ~/chromium/src (ctf) $ cat out/Default/args.gn # Set build arguments here. See `gn help buildargs`. is_debug=false ``` ``` ~/chromium/src (ctf) $ sha1sum out/Default/chrome a941d8692603dba7c75bb1330cc25b04e2882faa out/Default/chrome ``` Setting up a Build Deployment Files To run: ``` ./chromium/chrome --enable-blink-features=MojoJS --user-data-dir=/does-not-exist --headless --disable-gpu --remote-debugging-port=9222 $URL ``` Admin Bot The admin bot has a timeout of 20 seconds. The reference solution runs in around 10 seconds against remote. The flag is stored at `./flag-$(openssl rand -hex 16)`

pwn.name: SiceSiceBaby
pwn.desc: "The challenge author, poortho, is notorious for only writing glibc heap problems."

pwn.name: babyrop
pwn.desc: "FizzBuzz101: Who wants to write a ret2libc"

pwn.name: flippidy
pwn.desc: See if you can flip this program into a flag :D

pwn.name: hashbrown
pwn.desc:
Who doesn't like hashbrowns? I like them so much that I wrote a driver named after them! But apparently programming is hard and I might have made a mistake...

Please note that the following measures are active (whether they are important to the exploit process is up to you):

CONFIG_SLAB_FREELIST_RANDOM=y
CONFIG_SLAB=y
CONFIG_FG_KASLR=y

SMAP, SMEP, and KPTI are enabled as well.

nc hashbrown.dicec.tf 31337

Note: only one connection per IP is allowed, and there is a 10 minute wall-clock time limit from the moment you connect. Test locally!

pwn.name: sourceless-rust-wasm-pwn
pwn.desc:
I hope you like sourceless rust wasm pwn!

Haha, just kidding, here's the source.

... what, did you think the other part was a joke too?

Run with wasmtime ./wasmpwn.wasm --dir ./

rev.name: GuessTheVuln
rev.desc:
Sourceless web is the best! Luckily, we intercepted the server and a message the server was trying to transmit.

Flag only has lowercase letters and underscores within the curly braces.

You do not have to fuzz the challenge to solve it. Please don't fuzz it, I'm begging you.

rev.name: LostInYourEyes
rev.desc: Your eyes are like a maze, and I hate mazes, so help me escape.

rev.name: babymix
rev.desc: Just the right mix of characters will lead you to the flag :)

rev.name: procedural
rev.desc: So uhh, shader nodes are pretty cool... (tested in Blender 2.91.0 but should work in other versions)

web.name: BabierCSP
web.desc: The admin will set a cookie secret equal to config.secret in index.js.

web.name: MissingFlavortext
web.desc: Hmm, it looks like there's no flavortext here. Can you try and find it?

web.name: Watermark-as-a-Service
web.desc: My new Watermark as a Service (WaaS) startup just started using the cloud. It's so cool!

web.name: WebIDE
web.desc: Work on JavaScript projects directly in your browser! Make something cool? Send it here

web.name: WebUtils
web.desc: My friend made this dumb tool; can you try and steal his cookies? If you send me a link, I can pass it along.

web.name: build-a-panel
web.desc: You can never have too many widgets and BAP organization is the future. If you experience any issues, send it here
